mapper.insert: insert into base_dept(id, hosp_code, type_code, nation_code, code, name, ward_code, phone, person_name, up_dept_code, mg_dept_code, intro, place, remark, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time, type_identity) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{typeCode}, #{nationCode}, #{code}, #{name}, #{wardCode}, #{phone}, #{personName}, #{upDeptCode}, #{mgDeptCode}, #{intro}, #{place}, #{remark}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{isValid}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{typeIdentity})
mapper.update: update base_dept set type_code = #{typeCode}, nation_code = #{nationCode}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, ward_code = #{wardCode}, phone = #{phone}, person_name = #{personName}, up_dept_code = #{upDeptCode}, mg_dept_code = #{mgDeptCode}, intro = #{intro}, place = #{place}, remark = #{remark}, pym = #{pym}, wbm = #{wbm}, is_valid = #{isValid}, crte_id = #{crteId}, crte_name = #{crteName}, crte_time = #{crteTime}, type_identity= #{typeIdentity} where id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, type_code, nation_code, code, name, ward_code, phone, person_name, up_dept_code, mg_dept_code, intro, place, remark, pym, wbm, is_valid, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from base_dept where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and type_code = '3' and is_valid = #{isValid} and code not in (select DISTINCT up_dept_code from base_dept where up_dept_code is not null) order by name

select a.*,c.name as pharName,c.id as pharId from base_dept a , base_dept_drugstore b , base_dept c , sys_code_detail d where a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code and a.`code` = b.dept_code and c.`code` in(SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.drugstore_code,',',help_topic_id+1),',',-1) AS num FROM mysql.help_topic WHERE help_topic_id < LENGTH(b.drugstore_code)-LENGTH(REPLACE(b.drugstore_code,',',''))+1 ) and b.hosp_code = d.hosp_code and c_code ='YFLB' and b.type_code = d.`value` and b.type_code = '4' and a.id = #{loginDeptId} and a.is_valid = #{isValid} and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select c.id, c.name , c.hosp_code,c.type_code,c.type_identity,c.code,c.up_dept_code from base_dept a join sys_code_detail b on b.c_code = 'YFLBBS' and FIND_IN_SET(b.value,a.type_identity) and a.hosp_code = b.hosp_code join base_dept c on a.hosp_code = c.hosp_code and FIND_IN_SET(b.value,c.type_identity) where a.id = #{id} group by c.id, c.name , c.hosp_code

SELECT (select pt.id from base_dept pt where pt.hosp_code =e.hosp_code and pt.code = e.drugstore_code) id, e.type_code as type_identity, e.drugstore_code as drugStoreCode, t.name FROM base_dept_drugstore e, base_dept t WHERE e.hosp_code = t.hosp_code AND e.dept_code = t.CODE AND e.is_valid = '1' AND e.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and t.id = #{id}
select a.* from base_dept a where find_in_set(a.code,#{code}) and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.is_valid = '1'

SELECT e.drugstore_code FROM base_dept_drugstore e, base_dept t WHERE e.hosp_code = t.hosp_code AND e.dept_code = t.CODE AND e.is_valid = '1' AND e.hosp_code = #{hospCode}
and t.id = #{id}
select distinct name from sys_user where dept_code =#{code} and hosp_code=#{hospCode}
